channel.title: Vagrant on icyleaf
channel.description: Recent content in Vagrant on icyleaf

item.title: 学习 Ansible + Vagrant
item.description: Ansible is a radically simple IT orchestration engine that makes your applications and systems easier to deploy. Avoid writing scripts or custom code to deploy and update your applications— automate in a language that approaches plain English, using SSH, with no agents to install on remote systems. 简单来说 Ansible 是一个极简化
